alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 19 at 1:30PM MDT until July 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 315, 317, 322, AND 326... .Northwest winds of 15 to 25 mph with gusts around 35 mph will continue through the afternoon the afternoon relative humidity dropping to around 15 percent. The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity has created critical fire weather conditions. Conditions will improve early this evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 315, 317, 322, AND 326... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 315 Southern Campbell, 317 Weston County Plains, 322 Fall River County Area and 326 Pine Ridge Area. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Around 15 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity is producing critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
